parameters.content:
## Processing Credit Card Statement Emails
Currently supports eight Taiwanese banks. Extracts payment amount and due date from emails or PDFs, and automatically converts them into Google Calendar events

## Update Payment Status
If payment has been completed, you can update the Google Calendar event title and remove reminders here
